snippet: In light of the disappearance of a Malaysia Airlines jetliner last year, the deal allows nations to set aside radio frequencies so that airplanes can be tracked by satellite.
abstract: United Nations meeting results in international agreement on satellite tracking of airliners, move prompted by 2014 disappearance of Malaysia Airlines jetliner.
lead_paragraph: In light of the disappearance of a Malaysia Airlines jetliner last year, the deal allows nations to set aside radio frequencies so that airplanes can be tracked by satellite.

headline.main: Deal Is Set for Satellite Tracking of Jets
headline.print_headline: United Nations; Deal Is Set for Satellite Tracking of Jets
